archimate:Requirement.name: NC.1.5.10c: c) encrypting administrator access (e.g. by using secure management consoles, secure remote login shells such as SSH or encrypted connections using TLS, IPsec or equivalent)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
